comment: A relationship between an ordinal number less than or equal to a rank, and the cumulative hierarchy of sets ` R1 ` . Proposition 9.15(3) of [TakeutiZaring] p. 79. (Contributed by NM, 8-Oct-2003.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 17-Nov-2014.)
